pages.text: Letting a full block of [Liquid Crystal](entry://magical_blocks/liquid_crystal) absorb the immense heat of [#](bb00bb)Lava[#]() resulted in this.\Almost feels like a [#](bb00bb)Magma Block[#](), albeit way hotter.

pages.title: Incandescent Essence
pages.text: Crushing Blazing Crystal with an [#](bb00bb)Anvil[#](), you get this burning hot essence that almost sets your hand on fire when you touch it. Crushing [#](bb00bb)Magma Blocks[#]() seems to work, too, albeit with far less yield.

As [#](bb00bb)Water[#]() tried to touch a full block of [Liquid Crystal](entry://magical_blocks/liquid_crystal), the crystal turned solid.\Since even a light touch is enough to give you a cold shiver, you called it Frostbite Crystal.

pages.title: Frostbite Essence
pages.text: Crushing [#](bb00bb)Frostbite Crystal[#]() with an [#](bb00bb)Anvil[#]() gave you this ice cold essence, which almost makes your hand freeze just by holding it. Crushing [#](bb00bb)Ice[#]() seems to work, too, albeit with far less yield.
